title: Counter blox
description:
Take part in a 5v5 team based fire fight across a variety of maps spanning across the globe.

Earn in-match money by eliminating enemies and playing objectives, which you can use to buy new weapons, gear and grenades at the start of each round.

faq.question: Is this the full game?
faq.answer: This is a copy of counter blox made by a team of devs to be as close to the original as possible

faq.question: How do I spoof animations?
faq.answer:
-
You will need to animation spoof all animations in game preferably with this spoofer: https://shorturl.at/c4f44
-
You will also need to change ALL group IDs and webhooks etc.
-

faq.question: How do I upload the game?
faq.answer: You will also need to actually PUBLISH the game and turn on API Services in the game settings located on the topbar in Roblox Studio. (You can also search up where this is if you have the new Roblox Studio UI.)

faq.question: How do i give myself admin
faq.answer:
its only possible to give yourself ban menu. all code todo with skin granting was removed by the dev team

to give yourself ban menu go to ScreenGui -> Ban -> MainHandler -> ToggleUI and edit the GROUP_ID variable to a group you have perms in


then go to ServerScriptService -> Handler and change the GROUP_ID variable to the same one, you might have to change all the webhooks or just comment out anything to do with webhooks
